Package EnvironmentAPI.GeneralSources.PolynomialSources

Class PolynomialSource

java.lang.Object
EnvironmentAPI.GeneralSources.Source
EnvironmentAPI.GeneralSources.PolynomialSources.PolynomialSource
public class PolynomialSource
extends Source
This class describes a PolynomialSource, this is a source that follows a polynomial function determined by given points, Newton-Interpolation is used.
Author:
Yentl.kinoo@student.kuleuven.be

      public void clear​(java.util.Set<Pair<java.lang.Double,​java.lang.Double>> points)

      Parameters:

    • generateData

      public double generateData​(double timeinNano)
      Generate data given the polynomial of the sensor. This is determined using Newton interpolation. This function returns a byte (value in range [0,255]) If too many points are in this source, linear interpolation is used.
      Specified by:
      generateData in class Source
      Parameters:
      timeinNano - : The time to evaluate the polynomial in.
      Returns:
      a byte representing the amount of pollution in a range of [0,255].
